description:
Komugi and the others spend a day helping Mey Mey take care of the Kirarin Animals in Niko Garden. But the Kirarin Animals seem to be hiding something.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Day in the Life of Mey Mey the Butler-Sheep!
Hitsuji no Shitsuji: Mey Mey no Ichinichi
ヒツジの執事 メエメエの一日
